As she starts to drink, she realizes that the lemonade has a unique taste, it's tangy and refreshing.
Lily invites her friends over to taste the lemonade and they all agree that it's the best drink they've ever had.
They decide to make a lemonade stand and sell the lemonade to others.
The lemonade becomes popular and they make a lot of money.
Lily and her friends use the money to go on a trip to the beach.
